title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item in library outline view at first
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the library outline view.

Observed Behavior (OB): When trying to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the intended item.

Expected Behavior (EB): When selecting an item in the library outline view, the item should be selected, and the focus should remain on that item.

Steps to Reproduce (SR):
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the library outline view.
3. Observe the focus jumping to the library file node instead of selecting the intended item.
4. Repeat steps 2 and 3 to confirm that the issue consistently occurs at first selection attempt.
